# Coolify Environment Variables for Ente
# Copy these variables to your Coolify service environment configuration

# Database credentials (automatically generated by Coolify)
# These are set automatically by Coolify when you use SERVICE_USER_POSTGRES and SERVICE_PASSWORD_POSTGRES
POSTGRES_DB=ente

# Encryption keys (generate secure random keys)
ENCRYPTION_KEY=your_32_character_encryption_key_here
HASH_KEY=your_32_character_hash_key_here_abc
JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key_here_minimum_32_characters_long

# To generate secure keys, use these commands:
# openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d "=+/" | cut -c1-32
# openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d "=+/" | cut -c1-32  
# openssl rand -base64 32 | tr -d "=+/" | cut -c1-32

# Note: The following are automatically handled by Coolify magic variables:
# - SERVICE_USER_POSTGRES (auto-generated PostgreSQL username)
# - SERVICE_PASSWORD_POSTGRES (auto-generated PostgreSQL password)
# - SERVICE_USER_MINIO (auto-generated MinIO username)
# - SERVICE_PASSWORD_MINIO (auto-generated MinIO password)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_MUSEUM (auto-generated domain for museum service)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_WEB_3000 (auto-generated domain for web service port 3000)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_WEB_3001 (auto-generated domain for web service port 3001)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_WEB_3002 (auto-generated domain for web service port 3002)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_WEB_3003 (auto-generated domain for web service port 3003)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_WEB_3004 (auto-generated domain for web service port 3004)
# - SERVICE_FQDN_MINIO_3201 (auto-generated domain for MinIO console)

# Domain Configuration in Coolify:
# When deploying, configure these domains in Coolify:
# - Museum API: api.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 8080)
# - Web Apps: app.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3000)
# - Web Accounts: accounts.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3001)
# - Web Albums: albums.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3002)
# - Web Auth: auth.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3003)
# - Web Cast: cast.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3004)
# - MinIO Console: minio.vm.lucasdesenv.com (port 3201)
